lines.text: Mary, what do I do when I'm being robbed?
You give us the money, that's what you do, beard face!
You would give them all your money and you won't cash a government check?
Do you have to booze it up, Carol?
A mixed drink is not booze, Sherman, it's a cocktail, a before-dinner drink.
But dinner isn't for five hours yet.
Oh Duane, you don't even know me. I've slept with over three hundred men.
Three hundred men? In Paducah, Kentucky? Duane, wasn't easy.
No, Duane, it's a problem. It's a real problem. I'm like Ricky the Carnivorous Pony in respect to men.
I love you, I need you, and I wanna make you happy, that's all.
Oh, I don't know if that's what I really want out of life.
Yep...goin' to the Super Bowl. Gonna sell me some cocaine.
The International House of Pancakes is the one consistent thing in my life.
